tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE genetic_sequences (
  sequence_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  sequence_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  sequence_data BYTEA NOT NULL,
  creation_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE mutations (
    mutation_id BIGINT PRIMARY KEY,
    gene_id BIGINT,
    mutation_type VARCHAR(50),
    position INT,
    effect VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE genetic_sequences (
  ID INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sequence TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE sequence_metadata (
  sequence_id INT REFERENCES genetic_sequences(ID),
  gene_name TEXT,
  organism TEXT,
  PRIMARY KEY (sequence_id)
)

CREATE TABLE research_results (
  result_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  sequence_id INT REFERENCES genetic_sequences(ID),
  research_data JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE researchers (
  researcher_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name TEXT,
  email TEXT
)
